mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.case_id, b.case_name, b.description FROM case_user_auth a LEFT JOIN case_info b ON a.case_id = b.case_id WHERE 1=1 AND a.id = #{id}
SELECT case_id, case_name, description FROM case_info WHERE 1=1 AND case_id NOT IN ( SELECT case_id FROM case_user_auth WHERE 1=1 AND id = #{id} ) ORDER BY create_date LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(*) cnt FROM case_info WHERE 1=1 AND case_id NOT IN ( SELECT case_id FROM case_user_auth WHERE 1=1 AND id = #{id} )
